health_discussed_people_names: Hon. Mohamed Chiro Ndanda, Hon. Jimmy Odari, Hon. Patrick Muriuki Siminyu, Hon. (Mrs.) Nyamvula, Hon. Hudson Karume, Hon. Ibrahim Kondo, Hon. Riziki Fundi, Hon. Madundo
health_data_challenges: Challenges identified in revenue collection for trade licenses, impact on small business owners, non-payment of taxes leading to revenue loss for the county government
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Consider implementing a system for easier payment of trade licenses, review and amend the Mombasa County Trade Licensing Act, address revenue collection challenges, empower small business owners, improve structures for revenue collection, address infrastructure issues such as the condition of the Bamburi bridge, address water drainage infrastructure issues, expedite committee work on addressing community concerns
